CustomField.description: This field is auto-populated when points are shared/donated to other members and is used to store the IDs of other members of the program who are receiving points from the current member. A member can share points with up-to-up for other members within the defined program period.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is auto-populated when points are shared/donated to other members and is used to store the IDs of other members of the program who are receiving points from the current member. A member can share points with up-to-up for other members within the defined program period.
CustomField.label: Shared With Members Ids
